name: Create Zoho Recruit candidates from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Make will watch for new rows in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals and create candidates in Zoho Recruit using information received. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1HBn9oqkaQMsGpYaxBHbscmtTKNk3_5cDFPFM7aqLmew/edit?usp=sharing).
